concept.definition: Complicated cysts are 'in between' simple and complex. Although they share most of the features of simple cysts, they tend to have some debris inside them and echo back some of the ultrasound waves.
concept.display: Complicated cysts are 'in between' simple and complex. Although they share most of the features of simple cysts, they tend to have some debris inside them and echo back some of the ultrasound waves.

concept.definition: A 'complex' or 'complicated' breast cyst, refers to cysts that contain something besides clear fluid
concept.display: A 'complex' or 'complicated' breast cyst, refers to cysts that contain something besides clear fluid

concept.definition: Complicated cysts are 'in between' simple and complex. Although they share most of the features of simple cysts, they tend to have some debris inside them and echo back some of the ultrasound waves.
concept.display: Complicated cysts are 'in between' simple and complex. Although they share most of the features of simple cysts, they tend to have some debris inside them and echo back some of the ultrasound waves.

concept.definition: A 'Microcyst' on the other hand, is very small, often less than 2-3 mm. They will only show up on a mammogram or ultrasound, and, they often occur in clusters. Breast clustered microcysts are quite common, estimated to appear in around 6%% of all breast ultrasound scans
concept.display: A 'Microcyst' on the other hand, is very small, often less than 2-3 mm. They will only show up on a mammogram or ultrasound, and, they often occur in clusters. Breast clustered microcysts are quite common, estimated to appear in around 6%% of all breast ultrasound scans

concept.definition: Breast oil cysts are benign breast lumps that usually don't require treatment.
concept.display: Breast oil cysts are benign breast lumps that usually don't require treatment.

concept.definition: The cyst usually contains only fluid, and it is surrounded by a very thin wall.
concept.display: The cyst usually contains only fluid, and it is surrounded by a very thin wall.
